ygData.subject: Re: Hand to Hand
ygData.msgSnippet: Monk punches deffinitly speed up at high levels or they don t start out with the same delay. Go watch a 40+ monk tank something the damage they deal is
ygData.messageBody:
Monk punches deffinitly speed up at high levels or they don't start out with
the same delay. Go watch a 40+ monk tank something the damage they deal is
amazing.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... <kim@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, September 06, 1999 1:36 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hand to Hand


>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Sat, 4 Sep 1999, Mike McGovern wrote:
>>
>> Well, another thing to consider is the delay on hands is
>> kinda slow, compared to a dirk or longsword. (30 delay is
>> what I've heard before.) So, less punches= less chances
>
>35 delay. But it's been claimed that monk punches speed up as
>they gain levels. I've never seen any empirical evidence for
>it though.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
